rows.label: tlk70000051_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, it's you lot. I heard
about the Liberalitas
monsters that attacked.

rows.label: tlk70000051_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I wish they'd turned up when I was
around! That'd be way more interesting
than my usual monster duty.

rows.label: tlk70000051_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Thanks to those monsters, we got
some great info about where our
defenses and preparations are lacking.

rows.label: tlk70000051_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Don't worry, it's all already
taken care of. I sorted it
all out with Mars.

rows.label: tlk70000051_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Maybe now we can grab some of the
glory for ourselves instead of making
you lot do all the heavy lifting!
